titleInfo.title: Affleck's southern rural almanac, and plantation and garden calendar, 1854

mods.note: Hill, Louisiana copy is a reprint by New Year's Creek Settlers Association in Brenham, Tex. Library's manuscript copy is part of the Thomas Affleck Papers, Mss. 3, 1263, Louisiana and Lower Mississippi Valley Collections, LSU Libraries, Baton Rouge, Louisiana.
